title: Penglipuran Village Experience (Half-day)
overview: Visit Penglipuran, renowned for its well-preserved traditional Balinese architecture and clean village environment.

stops.description: Arrive and explore the village lanes, traditional houses, and bamboo forest.

title: Penglipuran Village & Kintamani Tour (Full-day)
overview: A full day exploring Penglipuran Village and the scenic Kintamani region.

stops.description: Arrive and explore the village and bamboo forest.
Visit the Kintamani highlands and view Mount Batur.
